SELECT ba.`id`, su.relname userrelname, SUM(price) sumprice FROM bus_achievement ba,sys_user su WHERE ba.user_name=su.username AND ba.examine_type=1
AND DATE(create_time) > DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 7 DAY)) AND DATE(create_time) <= DATE(NOW())
AND DATE(create_time) > DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 31 DAY)) AND DATE(create_time) <= DATE(NOW())
GROUP BY ba.user_name ORDER BY SUM(price) DESC

SELECT busa.`user_name`, su.`relname` userrelname, CONCAT (GROUP_CONCAT(busa.`rolenum`),",") roleName, SUM( busa.`proportion`) proportion, SUM(busa.`price`) sumprice FROM bus_achievement busa,`bus_house_transaction` bht,`sys_user` su WHERE busa.transaction_id=#{transactionId} AND bht.`id`=busa.`transaction_id` AND su.`username`=busa.`user_name` GROUP BY busa.transaction_id,busa.`user_name`
SELECT ba.*,su.relname userrelname FROM bus_achievement ba LEFT JOIN `sys_user` su ON su.username=ba.user_name WHERE ba.transaction_id=#{id}
